mapper.select: select t2.* from (SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS seq ,c.carNum ,c.carType ,c.oilType ,c.carOption ,c.socarZone ,c.rentAmt ,c.driveAmt ,c.carImg FROM car_v c ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc
select count(*) as count from car_v

select count(*) as count from (SELECT c.seq ,c.carNum ,c.carType ,c.oilType ,c.carOption ,c.socarZone ,c.rentAmt ,c.driveAmt ,c.carImg FROM car_v c WHERE ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ) t2

select t2.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS seq ,c.carNum ,c.carType ,c.oilType ,c.carOption ,c.socarZone ,c.rentAmt ,c.driveAmt ,c.carImg from car_v c ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ) t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc
